Name: Block_Quotes
Alphabet City: ["It's a fun neighborhood that's famous and everyone comes to because it is filled with affordable cool and trendy restaurants, cafes, bars, hip clubs, shopping, yoga studios,coffee shops, live music venues, gyms, and avant garde theaters & operas. Pretty much anything you could want you can walk to.", 'Historic Tompkins Square Park is 3 blocks away and anchors the colorful diversity of the neighborhood. The East Village abounds with a bar and cafe culture unmatched in other parts of Manhattan.']

Name: Lede
Alphabet City: Epitomizing shabby-chic, Alphabet City is a hip, bohemian enclave inside the East Village. Starving artists once considered this neighborhood their home, and the creative culture they established still shows through in the colorful murals and cool spaces that crowd its streets. Alphabet City has steadily evolved since the early 20th century, and it now overflows with trendy bars and stylish restaurants.

Name: Intro

Name: Photo_Captions
Alphabet City: ["Alphabet City's expressive nature evidences itself on every surface.", 'Garage doors and brick walls transform entire streets into walkable works of art.', 'Alphabet City inspires a kind of street style that lends itself to alternative inclinations. Skaters, especially, seem to love Alphabet City.', 'Alphabet City is rooted in a generations-old community.', "Its continued growth stems from its residents' dedication to cultivation.", "Alphabet City's vibrant interiors match the neighborhood's colorful exteriors.", "Cheeky bars, boutiques, bakeries, and delis dominate Alphabet City's streets.", 'As the sun sets on Alphabet City, the neighborhood awakens.', "Alphabet City's countless dive bars and intimate clubs are revered as NYC after-hours destinations.", "Public displays of expression contribute to the neighborhood's raw allure."]
